function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Residents of gated communities need to go outside their communities for daily requirements, increasing potential exposure to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection due to exposure outside the gated community.","Mitigation":"Promote delivery services and online shopping to reduce the need for residents to leave the community.","Technologies":"Online shopping platforms and delivery apps for groceries and other essentials.","People":"Residents of gated communities.","Owner":"Community management and local authorities."},{"Description":"Importance given to access control at entry points of gated communities, indicating potential transmission risks from outside the community.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection due to potential transmission from outside the community.","Mitigation":"Implement strict access control measures, health screenings, and temperature checks at entry points.","Technologies":"Access control systems, surveillance cameras, and health screening tools.","People":"Residents of gated communities, security personnel, and visitors.","Owner":"Community management, security agencies, and local authorities."},{"Description":"Belief that urban aspects reduce the risk of infection within the gated community, leading to potential complacency in following public health guidelines.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection due to complacency in following public health guidelines.","Mitigation":"Implement educational programs and awareness campaigns to emphasize the importance of continued adherence to public health guidelines.","Technologies":"Digital communication tools, informational websites, and mobile apps for health education.","People":"Residents of gated communities, community leaders, and local authorities.","Owner":"Community management, public health authorities."}]}
